title: Grand Theft Auto: Vice City ( GTA VC ) 1.0 – Driving action game in the big hair 80s

title: Ordinatore Pro 3.1 – Change your files’ and folders’ icons

title: Symantec Encryption Desktop 10.3.0 – Quality security/encryption for email and data
content: Symantec Encryption Desktop provides individuals a simple, easy-to-use desktop encryption solution to automatically protect confidential communications and digitally stored information with an integrated solution based on strong, broadly accepted security technology. PGP Desktop incorporates PGP Universal technology to provide automatic encryption, decryption, digital signatures, verification, and recipient key lookup, making it appropriate for both novice […]

title: Browser Care 1.1 – Clean the data stored by your browser
content: Browser Care is a powerful application that allows you to keep your browsers clean and under control since navigating accumulates files on your Mac. title: Business Mix Set 1.2 – Professional and stylish business templates for Apple’s Pages

title: MacX iPhone Video Converter 3.2.3 – Convert Any Video to iPhone, iPod, iPad

title: Omerta – City of Gangsters 1.0.7 – Simulation game with tactical turn-based combat
content: Omerta – City of Gangsters is a simulation game with tactical turn-based combat. title: WhiteList 1.12 – Generate a whitelist for e-mail spam
content: WhiteList will generate a list of all people you have mailed with. This list is usually called a whitelist for e-mail spam, as those are real people. You can export that list as v-cards so you can add them to a group in your address book. Features:– shows you the top list of people you […]

title: WebCode 1.1 – HTML5 Canvas drawing, CSS+HTML and SVG code
content: WebCode is a vector drawing app that instantly generates JavaScript+Canvas, CSS+HTML or SVG code. title: BoinxTV 1.9.2 – Live-production software for video podcasters
